Welcome to the Shoe Store Inventory App.

This app is a project of Udacity's Android Kotlin Developer Nanodegree. 

In this project, we will build our first Android application with Kotlin. 

We build a multi-screened Android application and implement a navigation file to take the user through the app. 

This project consists of five screens: 
1. Login screen: Email and password fields and labels plus create and login buttons 
2. Welcome onboarding screen 
3. Instructions onboarding screen 
4. Shoe Listing screen 
5. Shoe Detail screen for adding a new shoe
The next screen will display a list of shoes that may exist in the inventory. \n\nPressing the \"+\" button will bring you to the Detail where you can add another shoe to the inventory.
In the Detail screen, to add another shoe enter the shoe name, company, shoe size and description. \n\nPressing Save or Cancel button will bring you back to the listing screen.
